article.title: Critical Solutions Awarded $214 Million for Mine Detection Vehicles in South Africa
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Critical Solutions International Incorporated, Carrollton, Texas, was recently awarded a $214 million contract for the procurement of 118 vehicle mounted mine-detection MKK II Type II systems. Work will be performed in Gauteng, South Africa, with an estimated completion date in October, 2012. The U.S. Army Tank-automotive and Armaments Command, Warren, Michigan, is the contracting activity.
